name: ngRoundProgressBar
tagline: An Angular directive to provide round progress bars
body:
# ngRoundProgressBar An Angular directive that provides a nice round progress bar. ## How to User You can check the `example.html` for a working setup. Basically, you just need to include the `main.js` and `main.css` in the root directory and include `ngRoundProgressBar` as dependency. Then use as ```html
``` ## Credit The implementation is based on [this article](http://blog.invatechs.com/round_progress_bar_with_html5_css3_and_javascript) by [invatechs](http://blog.invatechs.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
